data.actual_result: You will see a completely different message to appear for a split second before it disappears.
data.expected_result: You see every message, and everything looks normal.
data.short_description: When sending an message after switching from an active chat, another message appears for a split second before displaying the correct message
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in an active chat, like Bug Hunters General. - Talk normally, use emotes, etc. (probably about 10 minutes) - Switch to another channel or server. - Send an message there. - Observe carefully.
